snippet: Those loyal to the president, who was overthrown in March, fired guns in what appeared to be an attempt to gain control from the ruling military junta.
abstract: Fighting breaks out in Bamako, Mali, as soldiers loyal to ousted leader Amadou Toumani Toure appear to be attempting a countercoup against the ruling military junta.
lead_paragraph: Those loyal to the president, who was overthrown in March, fired guns in what appeared to be an attempt to gain control from the ruling military junta.

headline.seo: Mali Soldiers Appear to Have Countercoup as Goal
headline.main: Loyalists of Mali’s Overthrown Leader Appear to Be Attempting Countercoup
headline.print_headline: Clashes in Mali as Loyalists Appear to Seek Countercoup

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject
